name: LetterboxdLog
description: Log your Jellyfin playback to Letterboxd.
overview: Syncs your Jellyfin watch history to Letterboxd, supporting anti-bot measures and raw cookies.

versions.changelog:
- fix: definitive fix for "Expired Form" logging failures (robust CSRF extraction)
- feat: hardened deployment workflow with all necessary dependencies
- fix: standardized manifest to 4-digit versioning to prevent duplication
- chore: full local environment cleanup and script migration
